citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:08am on
08/20/2015.
***VMO called and left a message with the animal manager. VMO waited at facility for 30 minutes before leaving.
